supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-14 (in mm), (1) 32 x 50, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 68 x 63, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 4 lines, (3) 73 x 53, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 60 x 65, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 4 lines, (5) 30 x 58, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 21 x 40, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (7) 22 x 37, (A) 1 line, right margin (?), (B) blank, (8) 30 x 47, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 18 x 32, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 64 x 42, (A) 3 lines, left margin (?), (B) 2 lines, left margin (?), (11) 61 x 30, (A) 8 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (12) 53 x 33, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (13) 38 x 39, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (14) 30 x 29, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins
